title: The Snow - Part 5
description: ***PART 5 IN THE SEQUEL TO THE RAIN***Ernest gave his last and strongest effort, but it's up to Tanner and Russell to make it worth something. The water hitting the rocks brings the memory of the Resilience and all its protection. If only they can get there...But the fog closes in fast, and a plan to follow the coast will never work if there's nothing to see. Find out if everyone survives in the final part of The Snow.
author: Joseph A. Turkot
